pages.text: A sword that only the mighty can wield. Unbreakable, can be summoned by pressing $(k:myth_and_magic.call) and only used by its owner.$(br2)$(o)Ah, this brings back some memories.$()$(br2)$(l:myth_and_magic:tasks)You can prove you are worthy by completing these tasks.$()
Excalibur can be found in the world and claimed if you are worthy.
